overview.en: CDR, which has passed the certification of many experts in China, keeps its value based on the Trading Commission of mall commodities, based on the development of Ethereum main chain, uses the economic incentive model of token, uses the third-party escrow account to reduce the risk of transactions, provides transparent audit reports, and legal protection against fraud. CDR, continuous technological innovation, optimization of user experience. Bring a variety of landing application scenarios to ensure the value of CDR. Users can realize it without worry
overview.zh: CDR，在国内通过了多名专家参与认证，且以商城商品交易佣金为基础价值保值，基于以太坊主链开发，使用通证经济激励模型，运用第三方托管账户来降低交易的风险，提供透明的审计报告，以及防止欺诈的法律保护。CDR，持续进行技术创新，优化用户体验。自带多种落地的应用场景，保障CDR的价值。用户可以无忧变现。
